short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts the line-height of expanded tweets to improve readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the readability of expanded tweets on Twitter with our simple and lightweight Chrome extension. With a single click, our extension adjusts the line-height of expanded tweets to make them easier to read. No more straining your eyes to read long tweets! Our extension is designed with user privacy in mind and does not collect or share any user data. Give your Twitter experience a boost with our easy-to-use extension today!
